revised_title: Fossil Flora and Age Determination of the Culm Measures in North-west Devon
tldr: The author examines the fossil flora of the Culm Measures in North-west Devon and determines the age of the beds. They conclude that the Upper Culm Measures are of Upper Carboniferous age, while the Lower Culm Measures are of Lower Carboniferous age. The study provides insights into the geologic time scale and the evolution of plant life during the Carboniferous period.
